title: Did Queen Elizabeth visit a Gurudwara in London? Here’s the truth behind these pictures | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the Coronavirus pandemic, a few pictures of Queen Elizabeth are being shared on social media with a claim that she visited Gurudwara Saheb in Hounslow, London to thank the Sikh community for their services.

NewsMobile fact-checked the post and found it to be misleading as the pictures are old.

We ran a search and found the pictures on the website of Getty Images. As per the caption, the pictures were taken in 2004, when the Queen and Prince Philip, the Duke of Edinburgh visited Gurdwara Sri Guru Singh Sabha in Hounslow, London to open phase two of the development.

The above information proves that the pictures are old. Hence, the claim is misleading.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
